Title: The Black Monk
Writer: Anton Chekhov (story), Ivan Dykhovichnyy, Sergey Solovev
Actors: Stanislav Lyubshin, Tatyana Drubich, Pyotr Fomenko, Lyubov Selyutina
Plot: Man who talks with a ghost called Black Monk is forced to see a doctor. After the treatment, he loses his ability to communicate with the ghost, becoming angry, violent and utterly unhappy.
